nodes.text: Cyrstas Eloinie was a female individual who was the daughter of Darred Eloinie, the CEO of the armaments firm Eloinie Petro-Munitions. During the Galactic Civil War, Cyrstas attended the Peaceful Dawn Rally on the planet Zaraksander to protest on the side of the Neo-Fundamentalist Phlangites, but during the event she was kidnapped by the NFP, who were unaware that she was a supporter of their cause. The NFP then took Eloinie into the Fioer desert and demanded that her father pay a ransom of 100,000 for her return. In response, Darred Eloinie hired the bounty hunter Valken Gresh to rescue his daughter.
